scripts.deploy: next build && next export && npm run deploy:pre-deploy && npm run deploy:surge && npm run deploy:gh-pages
scripts.deploy:pre-deploy: cp {.nojekyll,CNAME,manifest.webmanifest} out && git add . && git commit -m "Deploy to gh-pages" && git push && git status
scripts.deploy:gh-pages: git subtree push --prefix out origin retry-from-history-2-gh-pages
scripts.reminder: echo; echo 'Reminder: Do you need to \033[1;34m[skip ci]\033[0m?'; echo;
